casebody.data:
Terrance L. JAMES
v.
STATE of North Carolina No. 536P00-9 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Terrance James, For James, Terrance L. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, For State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 4th of March 2019 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Cleveland County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."

Ervin, J. recused
